SEARCH
Package co.kr.bluebird.sled

Interface IRfidConfig

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractReader, BTReader, Reader
public interface IRfidConfig
Interface definition for RFID configuration.

    • RF_GetEnableChannels

      String[] RF_GetEnableChannels()
      gets enabled channel
      Returns:
      enabled channels

    • RF_GetDefaultChannels

      String[] RF_GetDefaultChannels()
      Gets enabled default selected region channel table
      Returns:
      enabled default selected region channel table

    • RF_SetEnableChannels

      int RF_SetEnableChannels(int region, String[] channels)
      Sets channel in region
      Parameters:
      region - Target region
      channels - Target channel
      Returns:

    • RF_SetEnableChannels

      int RF_SetEnableChannels(String isoCod, String[] channels)

    • RF_SetRegionISO

      int RF_SetRegionISO(String RFRegion)
      Sets the Region value of RFID radio module
      (In case of this API, Run time during about 0 ~ 8 seconds is required. It sends related callback message(REGION_CHANGE_START(21) - REGION_CHANGE_END(22)) at the beginning and the end.)
      Parameters:
      RFRegion - : RFR900Wxxx (EU) (ISO 3166-1 alfa-2) refer Class SDConsts.RFISORegion
      Returns:
      Success : Constants.RFResult.SUCCESS = 0
      Range Error : SDConsts.RFResult.ARGUMENT_ERROR = -3
      Serial Error : SDConsts.RFResult.OTHER_CMD_RUNNING_ERROR = -4
      Condition Error : SDConsts.RFResult.READER_OR_COM_INTERFACE_STATUS_ERROR = -7
      Command State Error : SDConsts.RFResult.OTHER_CMD_RUNNING_ERROR = -4
      Connected Error : SDConsts.RFResult.SD_NOT_CONNECTED = -5
      Region Error : SDConsts.RFResult.OTHER_ERROR = -1
      * Can receive other error constant of "RFResult" class.

    • RF_checkRegionISO

      boolean RF_checkRegionISO(String nation)
      Gets result that compare current Region and param
      Parameters:
      nation -
      Returns:
      true : if region is same

    • RF_GetDutyCycle

      int RF_GetDutyCycle()
      Gets the duty cycle value of the RFID radio module
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • RF_SetDutyCycle

      int RF_SetDutyCycle(int millisec)
      Sets the duty cycle value of the RFID radio module
      Parameters:
      millisec - Import or set the resting time(millisecond) of each ports(0 ~ 1000) : 100(default)
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

      Sets the timeout value of access apis(ref. IRfidAccess interface) for the RFID radio module
      Parameters:
      millisec - Timeout value(millisecond) of access apis(100 ~ 10000 : 3000(default)

    • RF_UpdateDYNProfile

      int RF_UpdateDYNProfile(String filepath)
      Updates the Dynamic Profile
      Do update unconditionally
      (In case of this API, Run time during about 90 seconds is required. It sends related callback message(UPDATE_RF_DYN_MAC_START(53) - UPDATE_RF_DYN_MAC_FW(54) - UPDATE_RF_DYN_MAC_END(55)) at the beginning and the end.)
      Parameters:
      filepath - : File path for Dynamic Profile text file update
      Returns:
      Success : Constants.SDResult.SUCCESS = 0

    • RF_UpdateDYNProfile

      Returns:
      Success : Constants.SDResult.SUCCESS = 0

      int RF_SetSingulationControl(int RFSingulation, int minSingulation, int maxSingulation)
      Sets the minimum singulation, singulation, maximum singulation values of RFID radio module
      Parameters:
      RFSingulation - Start Q : Singulation Algorithm DynamicQ(0 ~ 15) : default 4
      minSingulation - Minimum value of singulation range
      maxSingulation - Maximum value of singulation range
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • RF_SetRegion

      int RF_SetRegion(int RFRegion)
      Sets the Region value of RFID radio module
      (In case of this API, Run time during about 0 ~ 8 seconds is required. It sends related callback message(REGION_CHANGE_START(21) - REGION_CHANGE_END(22)) at the beginning and the end.)
      Parameters:
      RFRegion - Import or sets-up history of country-by-country frequency(0 ~ 30)
      (UNKNOWN = -1, KOREA = 0, ETSI = 1, FCC = 2, AUSTRALIA = 3, BANGLADESH = 4, BRAZIL = 5,
      BRUNEI = 6, CHINA = 7, HONGKONG = 8, INDIA = 9, INDONESIA = 10, IRAN = 11, ISRAEL = 12,
      JAPAN_1 = 13, JAPAN_2 = 14, JORDAN = 15, MALAYSIA = 16, MOROCCO = 17, NEW_ZEALAND = 18,
      PAKISTAN = 19, PERU = 20, PHILIPPINES = 21, SINGAPORE = 22, SOUTH_AFRICA = 23, TAIWAN = 24,
      THAILAND = 25, URUGUAY = 26, VENEZUELA = 27, VIETNAM = 28, RUSSIA = 29, ALGERIA = 30,
      EGYPT = 31, CHILE = 32, GUATEMALA = 33, MACAO = 34,NICARAGUA = 35, CAMBODIA = 36, MYANMAR = 37, ETSI_UPPER = 38, PARAGUAY = 39
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

      String RF_GetAvailableRegionAtThisDevice()
      Gets the available region value at this sled device

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • RF_SetSession

      int RF_SetSession(int RFSession)
      Sets the session value of the RFID radio module(Session flag will be matched against the inventory state specified by target)
      Only operate when the toggle state is OFF
      Parameters:
      RFSession - Value of the Session(0 ~ 3) : 0(default)
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • RF_GetToggle

      Gets the toggle state of the RFID radio module
      (A flag that indicates, after performing the inventory cycle for the specified target, if the target should be toggled and another inventory cycle run)
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • RF_SetToggle

      int RF_SetToggle(int RFToggle)
      Sets the toggle state of the RFID radio module
      (A flag that indicates, after performing the inventory cycle for the specified target, if the target should be toggled and another inventory cycle run)
      Parameters:
      RFToggle - 0 : OFF - should not be toggled
      1 : ON - should be toggled
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • RF_SetDwelltime

      int RF_SetDwelltime(int RFDwell)
      Sets the dwell time of RFID radio module
      Parameters:
      RFDwell - The number of milliseconds to spend on this antenna port during a cycle (50 ~ 400) : 200(default)
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • RF_UpdateRFIDFirmware

      int RF_UpdateRFIDFirmware(String filepath)
      Updates firmware of RFID radio module
      (In case of this API, Run time during about 90 seconds is required. It sends related callback message(UPDATE_RF_FW_START(23) - UPDATE_RF_FW(24) - UPDATE_RF_FW_END(25)) at the beginning and the end.)
      Parameters:
      filepath - File path for RFID firmware update
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • RF_UpdateRFIDFirmware

      int RF_UpdateRFIDFirmware(android.net.Uri uri)
      Updates firmware of RFID radio module
      (In case of this API, Run time during about 90 seconds is required. It sends related callback message(UPDATE_RF_FW_START(23) - UPDATE_RF_FW(24) - UPDATE_RF_FW_END(25)) at the beginning and the end.)
      Parameters:
      uri - File path for RFID firmware update
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • RF_SetInventorySessionTarget

      int RF_SetInventorySessionTarget(int RFInvSessionTarget)
      Sets the inventory session target of the RFID radio module
      Only operate when the toggle state is OFF
      Parameters:
      RFInvSessionTarget - (0 ~ 1):0(default) TARGET_A = 0
      TARGET_B = 1
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • RF_GetSelectionFlag

      int RF_GetSelectionFlag()
      Gets the selection falg
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • RF_SetSelectionFlag

      int RF_SetSelectionFlag(int RFSelectionFlag)
      Sets the selection flag
      Specifies the state of the selected (SL) flag for tags that will have the operation applied to them
      Only operate when the selection option enabled state.
      Parameters:
      RFSelectionFlag - (2 ~ 3):3(default) TARGET_A = 0
      TARGET_B = 1
      Returns:
      Execution result value.(The detailed values are described in the implementation section.)

    • RF_SetRFIDProtocolType

      int RF_SetRFIDProtocolType(int type)
      Enable/disable Gen2/Gen2X/GEN2_GEN2X protocol
      Parameters:
      type - : Default 0(Gen2),1(Gen2x), 2(GEN2 and GEN2X)
      Returns:
      success : SDConsts.RFResult.SUCCESS = 0
      Condition Error : SDConsts.RFResult.READER_OR_COM_INTERFACE_STATUS_ERROR = -7
      Command State Error : SDConsts.RFResult.OTHER_CMD_RUNNING_ERROR = -4
      Connected Error : SDConsts.RFResult.SD_NOT_CONNECTED = -5
      Region Error : SDConsts.RFResult.OTHER_ERROR = -1
      * Can receive other error constant of "RFResult" class.

    • RF_GetRFIDProtocolType

      int RF_GetRFIDProtocolType()
      Get enabled protocol's type
      Returns:
      success : Protocol’s type
      Condition Error : SDConsts.RFResult.READER_OR_COM_INTERFACE_STATUS_ERROR = -7
      Command State Error : SDConsts.RFResult.OTHER_CMD_RUNNING_ERROR = -4
      Connected Error : SDConsts.RFResult.SD_NOT_CONNECTED = -5
      Region Error : SDConsts.RFResult.OTHER_ERROR = -1
      * Can receive other error constant of "RFResult" class.
